name: df-sh
body: |- wceq(csh, crab(s0, cpw(chba), w3a(wcel(c0v, cv(s0)), wss(cima(cva, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0))), cv(s0)), wss(cima(csm, cxp(cc, cv(s0))), cv(s0)))))
comment: Define the set of subspaces of a Hilbert space. See ~ issh for its membership relation. Basically, a subspace is a subset of a Hilbert space that acts like a vector space. From Definition of [Beran] p. 95. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
